.. _developer-manual:


This document is the Developer Manual for Goodman HTS Pipeline. It will provide a
quick overview of the main features of the pipeline, installation instructions,
restrictions and guidelines for using it.

:ref:`Version Numbering <dev-versioning>`

:ref:`Requirements <dev-requirements>`

:ref:`Documentation with Sphinx <dev-sphinx-docs>`

:ref:`VNC Setup  <dev-vnc-setup>`

:ref:`Building Manuals <dev-build-manuals>`

:ref:`Install Iraf <dev-install-iraf>`
